name: LD 41 - Mecha Dress Up
description:
Take on the role of the number one stylist in the fairy world on her greatest challenge, the mighty Mecha! Can you make him as cute as possible?

Don't get hit by the bullets and fire the magic spell to stun the Mecha.

  • Use WASD or Arrow keys to move;
  • Spacebar to fire;
  • Mouse to interact;

Our first jam, we combined the genres dress up and bullet hell, hope you have fun!
